title: Maksym Hrysyo
text:
Maksym Yosypovych Hrysyo (; born 14 May 1996) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="football%20%28association%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Lviv">Lviv</a>. 
Career.
Hrysyo is the product of the UFK Lviv School System and then played for FC Karpaty in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League%20Reserves%20and%20Under%2019">Ukrainian Premier League Reserves and Under 19</a> Championship during 3 seasons.
He made his debut for FC Karpaty as a main-squad player in a game against <a href="FC%20Stal%20Kamianske">FC Stal Kamianske</a> on 23 July 2016 in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
